short_summary: ECCC requires a Contractor to provide operation services of the Global Atmosphere Watch (GAW) Observatory at Alert, Nunavut
description: ECCC requires a Contractor to provide operation services of the Global Atmosphere Watch (GAW) Observatory at Alert, Nunavut, to ensure monitoring, sampling, measurements, data logs and quality control measures are performed for the continued success of the atmospheric measurement programs and monitoring network conducted at this site.
full_summary:
<ins-title-eng>Operator - Global Atmosphere Watch Observatory in Alert, Nunavut</ins-title-eng>
<ins-title-fra>Exploitant, Observatoire de veille de l’atmosphère du globe à Alert, au Nunavut</ins-title-fra>
<ins-referenceNumber-numeroReference>cb-7101-99187901</ins-referenceNumber-numeroReference>
<ins-amendmentNumber-numeroModification>1</ins-amendmentNumber-numeroModification>
<ins-solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation>5000057113</ins-solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation>

**Public Notice**
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor to provide operation services for the Global Atmosphere Watch (GAW) Observatory at Alert, Nunavut. The successful bidder will be responsible for ensuring the continued success of atmospheric measurement programs and monitoring networks conducted at this site.

**Procurement Details**
*   Solicitation number: 5000057113
*   Publication date: 2023-07-10
*   Tender closing date: 2023-07-24T14:00:00
*   Expected contract start date: 2023-08-07
*   Expected contract end date: 2024-08-31
*   GSN: 80161600, 80161601, 81141800
*   UNSPSC: Business facilities oversight, property management services, facilities management
*   Procurement category: SRV
*   Notice type: Request for proposal
*   Procurement method: Competitive – Open bidding
*   Selection criteria: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
*   Regions of opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of delivery: Nunavut Territory
*   Contacting entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada
*   Address: 351 boul. St-Joseph, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0H3, Canada

**Notice URL**
[Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7101/5000057113-%28english.pdf)

[Demo de Place](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7101/5000057113-%28francais.pdf)

**Contact Information**
*   Garvin Suepaul
*   garvin.suepaul
